name: States of the Union
description:
In order to join together, things need to be initially separate. In "States of the Union", you take on a solid state of matter, splitting yourself into up to three additional pieces and solving puzzles through the (currently) two levels. In order to complete levels, you need to regain enough of your previous splits, join them back together, and pass into the end goal. We hope you enjoy what we've made in this 48 hour period!

The entire process was streamed to Twitch here (the first video in the set). These will be archived and uploaded to YouTube.
